intro: Hey there! I'm Yugabharathi J, but you can call me SPiceZ.
paragraphs: I'm a Computer Science student driven by the thrill of building things that live on the internet. My journey started with a simple curiosity about how pixels move on a screen, and it has evolved into a full-blown obsession with crafting robust, scalable web applications.

When I'm not debugging code at 3 AM or deep-diving into the latest frontend frameworks, you'll find me designing sleek graphics for clients or competing in high-intensity hackathons. I thrive in environments where engineering meets creativity.

I believe in learning by doing, breaking things to understand them, and that the best code is written with good coffee and great music. Whether it's optimizing backend performance or perfecting a micro-interaction, I'm always chasing that next level of polish.
